name: Master of Sword Studio
description:
Roll-The-Dice Game Jam Submission the Team 2GatherTales

Random value gotten: Name, Master of Swords Studio
Goal of the game:
Reach 3000 points before your city becomes a tycoon(time ends).

How to get points:
Press items that on your inventory to sell, press 1,2 or 3 on your keyboard to start quests and get loot and points.

Description of the game:

You are a hero and owner of a humble studio apartment where you are a master of swords. 
As a owner of an armory and a shop, you go into adventures and you use your crafts in your adventures, as well to find new outlandish craft creations in your path, selling and buying, increasing the ability to deliver to heroes demand, making your village
more captivating to other heroes who will continue the trade and consequently the progress and emancipation of your shop into a new tycoon of sword mastering!
